mapper.insert: insert into t_food_item (ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODID, MATID, QUANTITY, UNIT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{foodid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_food_item set GMTCREATE = #{gmtcreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMTMODIFIED = #{gmtmodified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISDELETED = #{isdeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAMECREATE = #{namecreate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAMEMODIFIED = #{namemodified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FOODID = #{foodid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATID = #{matid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODID, MATID, QUANTITY, UNIT from t_food_item where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, GMTCREATE, GMTMODIFIED, ISDELETED, NAMECREATE, NAMEMODIFIED, FOODID, MATID, QUANTITY, UNIT from t_food_item
